title: Lag solely on League
body:
Since 6.14 ive been experiencing really bad ping specifically to league as well every other game, and server I connect to (discord, teamseak) my ping is always around 32-42 ms, but in league its around 300 ive tried disabling firewall, and my anti virus, as well as completely re installing and rearing the game files but my ping is still unchanged.

Someone please help

replies.body: Thanks for the steps you've taken so far to troubleshoot this!  It seems that your network is having an issue maintaining a stable connection with the game server.  It's getting through because you aren't disconnecting, but it's certainly delayed.  As a first step, I'd suggest running a [log reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)which can help diagnose what's going wrong with your connection.  The results will also provide some steps to take specific for your issue.  Let me know what you come up with, or if you run into any issues!
